## clickNestedText() function

Click any element by its text content.

The text can span multiple nodes compared to `clickText` which matches direct descended text nodes only.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function clickNestedText(page: Page, textOrRegExp: string | RegExp, { timeout, checkEvery, extraMessage, visible, assertSuccess, retryUntil }?: VisibleOption & RetryOptions & TimeoutOptions & CheckEveryOption & ExtraMessageOption): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  page | Page | puppeteer page object. |
|  textOrRegExp | string \| RegExp | Text or regex to match the text that the element must contain. |
|  { timeout, checkEvery, extraMessage, visible, assertSuccess, retryUntil } | [VisibleOption](./pentf.visibleoption.md) &amp; [RetryOptions](./pentf.retryoptions.md) &amp; [TimeoutOptions](./pentf.timeoutoptions.md) &amp; [CheckEveryOption](./pentf.checkeveryoption.md) &amp; [ExtraMessageOption](./pentf.extramessageoption.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
